Name: HAMMY
About the game: Experience the high octane thrill of being a hamster in a ball as you navigate Hammy through an ever-changing course of challenging obstacles and geometry at rapid speed while attempting to pick up as many collectables and powerups as you can! Challenge yourself to beat your best distances, improve your averages and unlock new Hammies and customise your hamster ball!
